entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 6:46AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: A Dense foog advisory is in effect for the Anchorage area through Noon today. Please see that product for further details.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 6:42AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...AREAS OF DENSE FOG POSSIBLE FOR THE MORNING COMMUTE... Areas of locally dense fog have developed this morning along the Knik Arm from the Knik River Bridge along the Glenn Highway southwest into Anchorage.
